content:
Buckley's on Queen Anne is a popular spot in the neighborhood.

To get to Buckley's on Queen Anne from your apartment in the 98122 zip code, you can follow these directions:

**Driving:**

1. From your apartment, head east on Queen Anne Ave N toward W Crockett St
2. Continue on Queen Anne Ave N for approximately 0.8 miles
3. Turn right onto W McGraw St
4. Buckley's on Queen Anne will be on your left at 2323 Queen Anne Ave N

The drive should take around 5 minutes, depending on traffic.

**Walking:**

1. From your apartment, head east on Queen Anne Ave N toward W Crockett St
2. Continue on Queen Anne Ave N for approximately 0.8 miles
3. Turn right onto W McGraw St
4. Buckley's on Queen Anne will be on your left at 2323 Queen Anne Ave N

The walk should take around 15-17 minutes, depending on your pace.

**Alternative:**

If you prefer to use public transportation, you can take the King County Metro Bus #2 or #13 from Queen Anne Ave N and W Crockett St to Queen Anne Ave N and W McGraw St. The bus ride should take around 10-12 minutes, and then it's a short 2-minute walk to Buckley's.

Please note that traffic and road conditions may affect the duration of your trip, so be sure to check for updates before you leave.

After lunch, you can head to your dance studio, which is about a 20-minute drive or ride from Buckley's on Queen Anne.

Enjoy your lunch and dance class!
